## GAD-7 vs BPI

for Instrument Comparisons Comparing different psychological instruments like GAD-7 and BPI can offer valuable insights into our understanding of mental processes. However, this task can be complicated and time-consuming, requiring elaborate manual effort from researchers. This is where Harmony, a data harmonisation tool, comes in. With its AI-powered approach, Harmony simplifies the process of finding similarities between different instruments like GAD-7 vs BPI, making it incredibly efficient for psychologists and social scientists. Harmony leverages advanced natural language processing and generative AI models to perform detailed comparisons between different instruments, even those sourced in different languages. Comparing GAD-7 vs BPI becomes as simple as selecting instruments from Harmony's extensive database or uploading your own in PDF format via the user-friendly interface. The tool effectively scans through the content and provides a percentage match for each item, delivering precise results in considerably less time. Particularly, when comparing GAD-7, a widely-used instrument for assessing generalized anxiety disorder, with BPI (Berkeley Puppet Interview) that measures children's self-perceptions, Harmony allows you to realise the overlapping areas and correlations that may not be instantly evident otherwise. The application of Harmony can bring an unprecedented degree of ease and precision when studying GAD-7 vs BPI, revolutionising the way researchers approach instrument comparison. Harness the power of Harmony and explore more efficient and effective ways to analyse and understand mental health metrics.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and BPI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and BPI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just BPI into Harmony</a> - compare BPI with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
